allow: Bash(for file in public/.htaccess public/index.php public/assets/css/style.css public/assets/js/main.js public/assets/images/favicon.svg)
Bash(for file in app/Core/App.php app/Core/Database.php app/Core/Router.php app/Core/View.php)
Bash(for file in app/Controllers/ContactController.php app/Controllers/HomeController.php app/Controllers/PageController.php)
